short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a QR code for the current page URL for open on your phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can simply continue to consult your website from your mobile by scanning the QRcode generated by the application.

Use :
- Install the extension
- Go to a webpage
- Open the extension the qrcode is generated
